attributes.additional_details:
THE RUNWAY GROUP
    SUPPORTED BY THE FOLLOWING HOUSINGS ASSOCIATIONS AND TRUSTS
    Helena Partnership,  One Vision,  New Charter, Willow Park, Community Gateway,  Eastlands Homes,  City West Housing Trust,  Together Group,  Parkway Green, Cheshire Peaks & Plains,  Incommunities,  Wirral Partnership,  Weaver Vale Housing Trust, Trafford Housing Trust
                                                                                           Petition Against
THE “ALL-IN-ONE” BENEFIT SYSTEM PROPOSED IN THE 2011 WELFARE REFORM BILL.
We, the undersigned, are Tenant Members of the Runway Group, which comprises of Tenants from 15 RSL's  within a radius of 50 miles of Manchester Airport.
From a Social Housing perspective we feel that this bill in its present form will disadvantage large numbers of society and will add a hugely increased rent arrears to RSLs
